title: Azure Test Plans Quick SLA Guide
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Test Plans issues

requiredFields:
Evidence
  Capture annotated screenshots (or a short screen recording) showing the exact error or irregular UI behavior.

Impact
  Note how many users are affected.

Onset & Frequency
  Record when the problem started (date/time) and whether it’s consistent or intermittent.

Environment & IDs
  Include: Organization (or Collection), Azure DevOps Services/Server version, and the Test Plan, Test Suite, and Test Case IDs.

Reproduction Steps
  List every action in order—one per line—numbered 1, 2, 3… Include the expected vs actual result after each step.

Automation Status
  Specify whether the test is Manual or Automated (and include pipeline/build IDs if automated).
  If the case has enough information to know automation then collect diagnositc pipeline logs.

Diagnostics for UI Issues
  Attach a HAR (network) trace and browser console logs.
